anchors.title: Project Engineer at Robins AFB in Georgia
anchors.description: A specialized officer role focused on managing and implementing complex engineering for weapon systems, from research and development (R&D) to acquisition and testing, bridging technical needs with acquisition programs, often coordinating with contractors and managing projects.
